articles.title: Demon’s Souls glitch on the PS5 gives you one-hit killing power - Polygon
articles.description: Using a Gold Coin while speaking to the Maiden in Black as her Luck-boosting buff is active causes a Demon’s Souls player’s Luck to scale infinitely. The Blueblood Sword’s damage scales with Luck; ergo, all enemies can be killed with one hit, at least until t…
articles.content: What happens if you wish for more wishes? This is kind of like that.
